text: @Region_7AAAAAAA @ParallelsMedia_ @NorcrossHoops @WheelerHoops @OfficialGHSA @GDPsports @willhammock @DFried_GDP @GwinnettTOC @TyPhotog @tvmedia15 @KyleSandy355 @GaPrepsNews The last time I remember being in the House of Blue for a Norcross v Wheeler matchup @farouq1 & @Ganilawalspeaks edged out JJ Hickson & the Wildcats
